body:
Comment 4: 
We will not be making any language changes for a while.

This language change is interesting but gets fairly complex fairly quickly.  Once you
can write
    b = a.(type)
it becomes very tempting to write
    var v1 b
    v2 := b(0)
    m := map[b]b{}
Then we have to think about global variables with dynamic types.  It's a very complex
change.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, **languagechange**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Thinking**._
